Indian Economy.title: Trump nominates conservative economist to head agency that compiles jobs, inflation data
Indian Economy.summary: Trump fired McEntarfer August. 1 after the July jobs report showed hiring slowed sharply this spring, with job gains in May and June revised much lower than initially estimated.

Indian Economy.title: Tourism Vision 2047: Industry aims for $3 trillion tourism economy and 200 million jobs
Indian Economy.summary: The conclave brought together the country’s 10 major national tourism and hospitality associations, industry stakeholders and policymakers under the aegis of the Federation of Associations in Indian Tourism & Hospitality (FAITH)

Indian Economy.title: Trade threat: When the going gets tough, the tough must get going
Indian Economy.summary: India’s response so far to the US trade reset has been well calibrated. This reflects the confidence that our economy can emerge stronger. We need a cohesive strategy based on empirical research to defend our interests.

Indian Economy.title: Opening India’s agriculture to a free-for-all would have serious repercussions for the sector
Indian Economy.summary: The pressure on India to dismantle its farm mechanisms and open up to international market forces would be justifiable if the US and EU were not subsidising their own agriculture

Indian Economy.title: From engineering goods to cereals: India’s exports surge 67% in a decade, led by these top 10 products
Indian Economy.summary: Top 10 products exported from India: In 2024, India's exports from April to December alone totalled around $602 billion.

Stock Market.title: Nifty Prediction today – Aug 12, 2025: Index can gain a little more
Stock Market.summary: Nifty 50 opens lower but rallies, bullish trend expected to continue, Nifty futures may reach 24,800 or 24,900.

Stock Market.title: Nifty Bank Prediction today – Aug 12, 2025: Index can resume the downtrend anytime
Stock Market.summary: Nifty Bank index opens lower, showing bearish trend with resistance at 55,780, potential drop to 55,000 support level.

Stock Market.title: Banking heavyweights pull markets down ahead of inflation data
Stock Market.summary: The Sensex fell 368.49 points (0.46%) to 80,235.59 after an 833-point swing, while the Nifty 50 dropped 97.65 points (0.40%) to 24,487.40, slipping below the 24,500 mark.

Startups & Funding.title: US cybersecurity startup 1Kosmos raises $57 mn Series B, expands in India and globally
Startups & Funding.summary: The fresh capital will fuel aggressive expansion plans, doubling sales and go-to-market teams in the US and India, and opening new offices in Mumbai and Delhi, with future plans for the Middle East and the Philippines.

Startups & Funding.title: 10-minute househelp startup Pronto raises $11 mn series A to expand beyond Gurgaon
Startups & Funding.summary: Pronto raises $11M to expand househelp services in India, aiming to organize and scale the domestic help sector efficiently.

Startups & Funding.title: As generalist VCs step in, specialist funds help deeptech startups finish the job
Startups & Funding.summary: Traditionally, deeptech startups have longer maturation cycles as they focus on creating intellectual property. These companies often require significant investments in time, money, and research. With generalist funds having larger purses, they can offer bigg…

Startups & Funding.title: IndiGo’s VC arm to back early-stage startups, gain early innovation edge
Startups & Funding.summary: India’s largest airline has a dedicated corporate venture fund targeting aviation, logistics, and consumer startups—aiming to future-proof operations and close India’s aerospace manufacturing gap.

Startups & Funding.title: Identity verification startup 1Kosmos raises $57 million in Series B
Startups & Funding.summary: 1Kosmos will be directing 35-40% of the funds towards research and development for product development.

Banking & Finance.title: MFIs’ self-regulatory bodies seek credit guarantee fund
Banking & Finance.summary: MFIN and Sa-Dhan propose credit guarantee scheme to boost lending to NBFC-MFIs, citing success of previous Covid scheme.

Banking & Finance.title: Watch out these three new-age stocks in today’s trade (August 12, 2025)
Banking & Finance.summary: Ola Electric teases MoveOS 6 for electric two-wheelers, Paytm gets RBI approval, Nykaa to acquire Nudge Wellness.

Banking & Finance.title: Mint Quick Edit | Inflation: Below target, above the worry line
Banking & Finance.summary: July’s reading was just 1.55%, having slid below RBI’s 2-6% target band. But it’s probably a blip, not a sign of weak demand or deflation risk. As we look ahead, policy needs to ensure that price stability endures.

Banking & Finance.title: Karur Vysya Bank expands footprint in Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh
Banking & Finance.summary: Karur Vysya Bank expands with new branches in Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh, and Tamil Nadu, offering comprehensive banking services.

Banking & Finance.title: RBL Bank ties up with CAMS to launch digital payment gateway
Banking & Finance.summary: RBL Bank will leverage its banking infrastructure to enable seamless acquiring settlement services, while CAMSPay contributes payment technology innovation

Technology Sector.title: ‘Opportunity to prove Indian Muslims love Tricolour’: Chhattisgarh Waqf Board chief asks mosques to hoist flag on Independence Day
Technology Sector.summary: While over 70% of mosques, madrasas and dargahs have given a positive response, some have objected, Waqf Board chairman Salim Raj said.

Technology Sector.title: ‘I’m dying because I want to eat bhindi’: Indian woman struggles as a vegetarian in South Korea
Technology Sector.summary: In a viral video, the student explains why she cannot eat local Korean dishes including pork and beef.

Technology Sector.title: Param Sundari trailer: Sidharth Malhotra-Janhvi Kapoor-starrer is another fun North-meets-South rom-com drama, fans have high expectations: ‘Saiyaara and now this’
Technology Sector.summary: Param Sundari trailer: Besides Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor, Param Sundari also features Rajeev Khandelwal and Aakash Dahiya in key roles. Produced by Dinesh Vijan, the movie is set to hit the big screen on August 29.

Technology Sector.title: US stagflation, discretionary spending: Why Indian exporters’ troubles run deeper than steep US tariffs
Technology Sector.summary: Sensing a deeper challenge for semi-skilled workers, the textile, gems and jewellery sectors have sought COVID-19-era support for the industry to prevent job losses, as nearly 30 per cent of exports from these sectors alone go to the US market.

Technology Sector.title: Cabinet clears four new chip plants worth Rs 4,600 crore in Odisha, Punjab and Andhra Pradesh
Technology Sector.summary: Union IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said the second plant has investments from Intel, Lockheed Martin, and other VC and PE funds.
